name: Aurorian Nights Demo
description:
In the world of Orbis, humanity was bestowed the gift of magic by the spirit Aurora. But when someone opens Pandora's Box, they release the evil spirit Pandora, who seeks revenge on the one who sealed her away: Aurora herself!

Aurora believes she has found four heroes destined to stop Pandora. Will they succeed in saving the world from her wrath, or are they simply following a path toward their own destruction?

This is a demo made for IGMC 2018.
